<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H6275|עָתַק]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עַתִּיק‎</span> **adjective** ==advanced, aged== (Biblical Hebrew (as Aramaism), √<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עתק‎</span>, q. v.); — construct (<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מַיָּא‎</span>-) <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎יוֺמִין‎</span> <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ע‎</span> ***one advanced, aged, in days*** [[Dan.7.9|Dan 7:9]]; [[Dan.7.13|Dan 7:13]]; [[Dan.7.22|Dan 7:22]] (compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[Eccl.25.4|Eccl 25:4]] and elsewhere, [[BDB#PS|PS]]<sup>3011</sup>).
